question: [Detailed] Dansk: Angiv which integer bin occurs most frequently fra histogrammet.

qas.question: [Detailed] Dansk: Angiv which integer bin occurs most frequently fra histogrammet.
[Review] Deutsch: Gib how many samples were used in total anhand des Histogramms an.
[Calm] Svenska: Ange how many entries fall inside the modal bin utifran histogrammet.
